mapper.select: insert into Video values(seq_v_num.nextval, #{v_title}, #{v_content}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{v_hit}, #{v_orgfilename}, #{v_savefilename},#{v_delete}, #{genre_num}, #{age_grade_num}, #{m_num},#{v_orgthumbnail},#{v_savethumbnail})

select * from (select b.*,g.GENRE_NAME,a.AGE_GRADE_NAME,rownum rnum from genre g,age_grade a,(select * from video where m_num=#{m_num} and v_delete=0 order by v_num desc) b where g.genre_num=b.genre_num and a.age_grade_num=b.age_grade_num) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
